main event: A pilot observed a white object in the sky resembling a satellite while flying over Baltimore, Maryland.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at an altitude of 3500 ft.,The object was reported to be the size of a star,The pilot thought it was an airborne object in his flight path but there was no traffic reported on radar,The object was moving on a heading of approximately 260 degrees magnetic,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
sighted object: a white object resembling a satellite
witness description: a pilot flying a United DC-8
